{"id":971571007,"question_id":2787,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1686800761,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/971571007/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Movement of Robots","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumDistance(int[] nums, String s, int d) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        while(d>0){\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n                char ch = s.charAt(i);\n                \n                if(ch=='R'){\n                    nums[i]++;\n\n                }else{\n                    nums[i]--;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            d--;\n        }\n        \n        int M = (int) 1e9+7;\n        \n        long res =0;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n                \n                res = res + Math.abs(nums[i]-nums[j])%M;\n                res%=M;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        return (int)res;\n        \n       \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"movement-of-robots","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
